posts.post_content: Why not just play [Juggernaut](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Juggernaut)? They are essentially the same card, except Juggernaut is an artifact (which is mostly a benefit), can't be blocked by Walls (however minor a benefit that is), and doesn't need a ![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) card (when it requires a heavy commitment to ![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)) to lose a minor drawback that, frankly, doesn't need to be lost.
posts.html:
Why not just play Juggernaut? They are essentially the same card, except Juggernaut is an artifact (which is mostly a benefit), can't be blocked by Walls (however minor a benefit that is), and doesn't need a card (when it requires a heavy commitment to ) to lose a minor drawback that, frankly, doesn't need to be lost.
